rules.natural: If the research team receives government grant funding, then they complete the study on drought-resistant wheat
The research team receives government grant funding or they receive private grant funding
Provided that the research team has advanced sensor equipment, then if they complete fieldwork during the spring season, they will complete the study on drought-resistant wheat
If the research team follows ethical guidelines protocol, then they do not publish preliminary findings
Under the condition that the research team implements changes to their procedures, they request assistance from consultants
If the research team receives private grant funding, then they achieve the crop yield milestone
If the review board approves a project extension, then should the private grant funding not lead to study completion, the research team does not modify their research methodology
The review board either approves a project extension or denies a project extension
If the research team submits an appeal against the decision, then whenever private grant funding fails to lead to study completion, they do not modify their research methodology
The research team completes fieldwork during the spring season or they complete fieldwork during the summer season
Should the research team complete fieldwork during the summer season, then they complete the study on drought-resistant wheat
Provided that achieving the crop yield milestone does not result in study completion, the research team implements changes to their procedures
When private grant funding does not trigger study completion, the research team modifies their research methodology
Under the condition that denying a project extension does not cause the research team to submit an appeal, they accept the ruling on their case
Should denying a project extension not result in the research team submitting an appeal, then they do not accept the ruling on their case
If the research team does not follow ethical guidelines protocol, then they violate ethical guidelines protocol
The research team publishes preliminary findings if they do not complete the study on drought-resistant wheat
